code: import{useContext}from'react';import{WeatherContext}from'../context/WeatherContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Forecast(){const{latestWeatherData,unit,setSelectedDay}=useContext(WeatherContext);if(!(latestWeatherData!==null&&latestWeatherData!==void 0&&latestWeatherData.forecast))return null;const dailyForecasts=latestWeatherData.forecast.list.filter(item=>item.dt_txt.includes('12:00:00')).slice(0,5);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"forecast",children:dailyForecasts.map(day=>{const date=new Date(day.dt*1000).toLocaleDateString('en-US',{weekday:'short'});const temp=Math.round(day.main.temp);const unitSymbol=unit==='metric'?'째C':'째F';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"forecast-day",onClick:()=>setSelectedDay(day),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"http://openweathermap.org/img/wn/".concat(day.weather[0].icon,".png"),alt:day.weather[0].description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[temp,unitSymbol]})]},day.dt);})});}export default Forecast;
